tool.name: tool_9

param.name: IDENTITY
param.dialogReference:
Identical Values

Boolean

Default: 0

If set, neighbour cells with the same value as the center cell are interpreted to be lower for minima and higher for maxima identification.

param.name: ABSOLUTE
param.dialogReference:
Absolute

Boolean

Default: 0

If set, only the grid's absolute maximum/minimum point is returned.

tool.summary: Extracts local grid value minima and maxima of to vector points.
